name: Room for up to 4 in Updated 1 BR apt by T!
neighborhood_overview: The proximity and accessibility to just about everything in Boston and Cambridge.
description:
Enjoy your time in Boston in a century-old brownstone building. A freshly renovated second floor 1 BR apartment with everything you need to spend a weekend or weeks away from home. Exceptional convenience to the T (our subway) gives you access to all that Boston and Cambridge have to offer. Old world charm is the background for a clean space with a new bathroom and updated kitchen. Room for 4 with a private queen bed and an Ikea couch that converts to a sleeper in the living room.

The space
The entire apartment comes off of a fresh renovation. The kitchen has a new tile floor and concrete counters, a gas range, and plenty of cabinet space. Living room floor was just sanded and the couch converts to a sleeper for two. Very large bedroom with a queen bed and spacious closet.

Guest access
Gas range
Coffee maker
Microwave
Toaster
Dishwasher
Disposal
Iron/board
Wifi

Other things to note
